name: Ext_R3_Coverage_gr_subClass
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Coverage.grouping.subClass for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Coverage.grouping.subClass from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Coverage|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: An identifier for the subsection of the class
element.definition: Identifies a sub-style or sub-collective of coverage issues by the underwriter, for example may be used to identify a subclass of coverage such as a sub-level of deductables or co-payment.
element.comment: Mapping of FHIR R3:Coverage element `Coverage.grouping.subClass` to R4:Coverage element ``

element.short: An identifier for the subsection of the class
